Package bankapplication

Class Bank

  • java.lang.Object
    • bankapplication.Bank

  • public class Bank
extends java.lang.Object
    The class Bank contains the methods for the basic operations of Bank. A Bank object maintains an ArrayList of Account objects

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      Bank​()  

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void accessAccount​()
      This method allows the users to access their accounts by providing the Account Number.
      double calculateTotalMoney​()
      This method calculates the total money available with the bank.
      void createAccount​()
      This method creates an Account object and initializes it with the account details.
      Account findRichestPerson​()
      This method identifies the richest account holder in the bank.
      java.util.ArrayList<Account> getAccounts​()
      This method gets the ArrayList of Accounts in the bank
      Account getOtherAccount​()
      This method gets the account number of the other account where money is to be transfered.
      void getUserAccount​(int accNum)
      This method searches the account of the user in the ArrayList of accounts and displays it.
      double readAmountToBeTransfered​()
      This method reads the amount to be transfered from standard input.
      void transfer​(Account userAccount, Account otherAccount, double amt)
      This method performs the transaction of transferring money to another account.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Bank

        public Bank​()

    • Method Detail

      • createAccount

        public void createAccount​()
        This method creates an Account object and initializes it with the account details. After the account is created, the details of the account are displayed.

      • accessAccount

        public void accessAccount​()
        This method allows the users to access their accounts by providing the Account Number.

      • getUserAccount

        public void getUserAccount​(int accNum)
        This method searches the account of the user in the ArrayList of accounts and displays it. Calls displayAccountMethod to display the account menu and gets user choice. Based on the choice, appropriate methods are called to avail the services.
        Parameters:
        accNum - This is the Account Number of the user whose account is to be accessed.

      • getOtherAccount

        public Account getOtherAccount​()
        This method gets the account number of the other account where money is to be transfered.
        Returns:
        the other Account.

      • readAmountToBeTransfered

        public double readAmountToBeTransfered​()
        This method reads the amount to be transfered from standard input.
        Returns:
        amount to be transfered

      • transfer

        public void transfer​(Account userAccount,
                     Account otherAccount,
                     double amt)
        This method performs the transaction of transferring money to another account. The method gets the other account number from the user as input and transfers the amount specified.
        Parameters:
        userAccount - This is the account of the user who wants to perform the transfer.

      • calculateTotalMoney

        public double calculateTotalMoney​()
        This method calculates the total money available with the bank.
        Returns:
        Total money available in the bank.

      • findRichestPerson

        public Account findRichestPerson​()
        This method identifies the richest account holder in the bank.
        Returns:
        Account having the highest balance.

      • getAccounts

        public java.util.ArrayList<Account> getAccounts​()
        This method gets the ArrayList of Accounts in the bank
        Returns:
        the ArrayList of accounts.
